rooms.description: spacious living room with Kerala-style wooden jalis and traditional decor.
open dining area adjoining the living room, featuring a stone mosaic floor and traditional Kerala motifs.
functional kitchen with modern amenities integrated in a traditional Kerala style setting. Uses local materials and energy-efficient appliances.
luxurious master bedroom with an attached bathroom; features traditional Kerala woodwork and natural lighting.
primary bedroom incorporating ample storage and traditional elements like wooden carvings; adjacent to the central courtyard.
secondary bedroom with a view of the courtyard and traditional Kerala-style ventilation openings.
quiet study or home office space with natural lighting and traditional design elements.
guest bedroom integrated within the living space; features a small en-suite bathroom using cost-effective local materials.
storage and utility room for cleaning supplies and other household essentials; designed in a minimalist style using local materials.
secondary bathroom for guest convenience, integrated into the corridor adjacent to the central courtyard.

openings.description: traditional Kerala-style entrance with a carved wooden door and stone pathway aligned with Vastu principles.
large windows in the living room for natural light, using jali work to maintain privacy while respecting traditional aesthetics.
connecting corridor doors between rooms ensuring seamless transition and adherence to Vastu principles for energy flow.
skylight in the central courtyard providing natural ventilation and light, enhancing overall ambiance.
